Key Match Events: Afghanistan won the toss and opted to field.
India rested captain Rohit Sharma, leg-spinner Yuzvendra Chahal, and all-rounder Hardik Pandya.
KL Rahul walked out for the toss as stand-in captain.
India made 3 changes for the match: Axar Patel, Deepak Chahar, and Dinesh Karthik were included in the XI.
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma wanted to take a break considering the tough conditions in the UAE and the busy schedule ahead of the T20 World Cup.
India was knocked out of the race to the final of the Asia Cup 2022.
Teams chasing have won the majority of the matches in Dubai.
